welcome_message_body: Welcome to Taoyuan District, Taiwan! Get ready to immerse yourself in the charm of this bustling city, known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Taoyuan has to offer.

restaurants.name: 麥當勞 McDonald's
restaurants.description: 麥當勞 McDonald's is a fast food restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: 詠順泰國菜
restaurants.description: 詠順泰國菜 is a asian restaurant located in 桃園縣.
restaurants.address: 延平路11號, 桃園縣, 桃園縣 330

restaurants.name: 多那之烘焙坊 Donutes
restaurants.description: 多那之烘焙坊 Donutes is a bakery located in T’ao-yüan.
restaurants.address: 復興路110號, T’ao-yüan, 桃園縣 330

restaurants.name: 豆舖咖啡
restaurants.description: 豆舖咖啡 is a café located in New Taipei City.
restaurants.address: 大興西路二段322號, New Taipei City

restaurants.name: 南平鵝肉
restaurants.description: 南平鵝肉 is a chinese restaurant located in the city.

airports.airport_name: Taiwan Taoyuan International (Chiang Kai Shek International)

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The first and largest terminal at Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport, exclusively serving China Airlines and SkyTeam alliance flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 3-hour time limit per device.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 3 hours.
